title: # 439 - Adam DeVine & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Actor/Comedian Adam DeVine. We talk about Workaholics, Pitch Perfect, partying, Danny McBride, The Righteous Gemstones, getting hit by a cement truck, and much more!

Check out Adam’s new podcast that he does with the cast of Workaholics “This is Important” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/this-is-important/id1529931681 

This episode is brought to you by Benebone. Go to http://www.chewy.com and use promo code “Bert” for 30% off your first order.

This podcast is also brought to you by Hims. Go to http://www.forhims.com/bertcast for your free visit.

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop. Go to http://www.Whoop.com and use the Code “Bert” at checkout to save 15%. 

This episode is also brought to you by DHM Detox. Get 20% off your first order plus free shipping in the US at http://www.nodayswasted.co/Bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Harry’s. Redeem a Harry’s Trial Set at http://www.HARRYS.COM/BERT for just $3!

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
